*This project is a part of NOAA Fisheries [PAM SI
coordination](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM_National_Network/content/SI%20coord/SI_Coordination.html)*

::: page-layout
::: main-content
Passive Acoustic Monitoring is an effective means of monitoring marine
mammals and the marine environment, and NOAA Fisheries is expanding
their efforts into PAM-equipped underwater gliders as a means of
conducting this research to meet their management needs.

This site provides updated information on these efforts.

![](content/images/PAMplatforms_gliders.png){width="618"}

*Information provided here is ongoing, and is frequently updated.*
:::
